de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types
Class Type

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.Type
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrettyPrintable, PrettyPrintPriorities
Direct Known Subclasses:
MonoType, PolyType
public abstract class Type
extends Object
implements PrettyPrintable, PrettyPrintPriorities

Abstract base class for all types used within the type checker and the various parsers.

Version:
$Rev: 296 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
PrettyPrintable

Field Detail

EMPTY_SET

protected static final Set<TypeVariable> EMPTY_SET
Shared empty set, returned by free() if the type does not contain any free type variables.

Constructor Detail

Type

protected Type()
Constructor for all types.

Method Detail

free

public Set<TypeVariable> free()
Returns the set of free type variables present within this type. The default implementation simply returns the empty set, and derived classes will need to override this method to return the set of free type variables. The returned set should be considered read-only by the caller and must not be modified.

Returns:
the set of free type variables within this type.

substitute

public abstract Type substitute(TypeSubstitution substitution)
Applies the substitution to this type and returns the resulting type, which may be this type itself if either this type does not contain any type variables or no type variables that are present in the substitution.

Parameters:
substitution - the TypeSubstitution to apply to this type.
Returns:
the new type.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the substitution is null.

toPrettyString

public final PrettyString toPrettyString()
Returns a PrettyString that can be used to represent this printable object, and extract information about possible other printables contained within this object.

Specified by:
toPrettyString in interface PrettyPrintable
Returns:
the pretty string for this printable.
See Also:
common.prettyprinter.PrettyPrintable#toPrettyString()

toPrettyStringBuilder

public abstract PrettyStringBuilder toPrettyStringBuilder(PrettyStringBuilderFactory factory)
Returns the pretty string builder used to pretty print this type. The pretty string builder must be allocated from the specified factory, which is currently always the default factory, but may also be another factory in the future.

Parameters:
factory - the PrettyStringBuilderFactory used to allocate the required pretty string builders to pretty print this type.
Returns:
the pretty string builder used to pretty print this type.
See Also:
toPrettyString(), PrettyStringBuilder, PrettyStringBuilderFactory

toString

public final String toString()
Returns the string representation for this type. This method is mainly used for debugging.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
the pretty printed string representation for this type.
See Also:
toPrettyString(), Object.toString()
